Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
The Menu class represents Provides a text-based user interface for managing an address book. This includes adding, removing, finding, and listing entries, as well as loading them from a file.
Since:
Feb. 26, 2024

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private AddressBook addressBook
    The address book to manage through this menu.
    private java.util.Scanner scanner
    Scanner for reading user input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Menu​(AddressBook addressBook)
    Constructs a new Menu instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void displayMenu()
    Displays the main menu and handles user input for various operations.
    private void findAddressEntries()
    Finds and displays entries from the address book that match the last name provided by the user.
    private void listAddressEntries()
    Lists all entries in the address book.
    private void loadEntriesFromFile()
    Loads address entries from a specified file into the address book.
    private java.lang.String prompt_City()
    Prompts the user for the city name of the address entry.
    private java.lang.String prompt_Email()
    Prompts the user for the email of the address entry.
    private java.lang.String prompt_FirstName()
    Prompts the user for the first name of the address entry.
    private java.lang.String prompt_LastName()
    Prompts the user for the last name of the address entry.
    private java.lang.String prompt_State()
    Prompts the user for the state name of the address entry.
    private java.lang.String prompt_Street()
    Prompts the user for the street name of the address entry.
    private java.lang.String prompt_Telephone()
    Prompts the user for the telephone number of the address entry.
    private int prompt_Zip()
    Prompts the user for a zip code and ensures that the input is a valid integer.
    private void removeAddressEntry()
    Prompts the user for the last name and removes matching entries from the address book.

    • loadEntriesFromFile

      private void loadEntriesFromFile()
      Loads address entries from a specified file into the address book.

    • removeAddressEntry

      private void removeAddressEntry()
      Prompts the user for the last name and removes matching entries from the address book.

    • findAddressEntries

      private void findAddressEntries()
      Finds and displays entries from the address book that match the last name provided by the user.

    • listAddressEntries

      private void listAddressEntries()
      Lists all entries in the address book.

      Returns:
      The state name entered by the user.

    • prompt_Zip

      private int prompt_Zip()
      Prompts the user for a zip code and ensures that the input is a valid integer. Continuously prompts the user until a valid integer is entered for the zip code.
      Returns:
      The validated zip code entered by the user.

    • prompt_Telephone

      private java.lang.String prompt_Telephone()
      Prompts the user for the telephone number of the address entry.
      Returns:
      The telephone number entered by the user.

    • prompt_Email

      private java.lang.String prompt_Email()
      Prompts the user for the email of the address entry.
      Returns:
      The email entered by the user.
